mosinstall.name: acctexp
mosinstall.author: Helder Garcia, David Deutsch
mosinstall.description: A complete subscription manager system. By Helder Garcia (hlbog) and David Deutsch (skOre).

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_eventlog` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `datetime` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `short` varchar(60) NOT NULL, `tags` text NULL, `event` text NULL, `params` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_config` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `settings` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_config_processors` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(60) NOT NULL, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `info` text NULL, `settings` text NULL, `params` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_invoices` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `userid` int(11) NULL default '0', `invoice_number` varchar(64) NULL, `created_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `transaction_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `usage` varchar(255) NULL, `method` varchar(40) NULL, `amount` varchar(40) NULL, `currency` varchar(10) NULL, `fixed` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `coupons` varchar(255) NULL, `params` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_log_history` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `proc_id` int(4) NULL, `proc_name` varchar(100) NULL, `user_id` int(4) NULL, `user_name` varchar(100) NULL, `plan_id` int(4) NULL, `plan_name` varchar(100) NULL, `transaction_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `amount` varchar(40) NULL, `invoice_number` varchar(60) NULL, `response` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_plans` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `visible` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '999999', `name` varchar(40) NULL, `desc` text NULL, `email_desc` text NULL, `email_desc_exp` text NULL, `send_exp_mail` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `params` text NULL, `custom_params` text NULL, `restrictions` text NULL, `micro_integrations` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_microintegrations` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `system` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '999999', `name` varchar(40) NULL, `desc` text NULL, `class_name` varchar(40) NULL, `params` text NULL, `auto_check` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `on_userchange` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `pre_exp_check` int(4) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_subscr` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(11) NULL, `type` varchar(40) NULL, `status` varchar(10) NULL, `signup_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `lastpay_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cancel_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `eot_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `eot_cause` varchar(100) NULL, `plan` int(11) NULL, `previous_plan` int(11) NULL, `used_plans` varchar(255) NULL, `recurring` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `lifetime` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `email_sent` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_coupons` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '999999', `coupon_code` varchar(255) NULL, `created_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `name` varchar(255) NULL, `desc` text NULL, `discount` text NULL, `restrictions` text NULL, `params` text NULL, `usecount` int(64) NOT NULL default '0', `micro_integrations` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__acctexp_coupons_static` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` int(4) NOT NULL default '1', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '999999', `coupon_code` varchar(255) NULL, `created_date` datetime NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `name` varchar(255) NULL, `desc` text NULL, `discount` text NULL, `restrictions` text NULL, `params` text NULL, `usecount` int(64) NOT NULL default '0', `micro_integrations` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
